content.description: Starting in large pocket on the left side of the face (right of the dihedral) Climb up face without traversing into the crack system or using the detached wall to the left. Is it an eliminate? Maybe. But it climbs directly and seems worthwhile to me. Also might be the only harder line in the Reach Around area. At least V8. Could be a lot harder.
content.protection: A couple pads and a spotter.
content.location: East end of the Reach Around Boulders.

content.description: Sit Start with hands on small ledge in the center of the aete. Climb straight up the arete.
content.protection: One pad and a spotter would be helpful.
content.location: East end of the Reach Around Boulders.

content.description: A fun but slightly tricky slab. Stand start on left side of the dihedral with left hand on a good side pull and right hand on the arete about shoulder height. Establish feet and climb straight up. Right wall seems detached and is off for the grade. Probably VB or V0 if using the right wall.
content.protection: A couple pads and a spotter if possible. There is a large block close to the landing area that could come into play for an uneven landing.
content.location: Left side of the dihedral at the East end of the Reach Around Boulders.

content.description:
A small outcropping of short cliffs/boulders around the backside of the dome from the Picnic Rock Area. Rock and route quality is not as good as the Picnic Rock area, but these boulders could be a great place to warm up, or bring climbers who can't climb the harder problems that the main area lends itself to. The boulders are approximately between 8 and 14 feet high, and follow a cliff band Ã  la Devils Lake bouldering.

 This area currently needs significant development. It may contain 20 or so lines on the easier end of the v-scale (VB-V3). A handful might be 3 star quality, but most are probably 1 or two stars. The rock is different from the main area and there is a fair amount of flakey choss in spots, but it seems like there is decent rock underneath if you are willing to do some cleaning.
